Type.Name: List

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit List extends GLib.ListBase

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A list class used by Gtk

remarks.para: is managed wrapper for the underlying C list implementation used by Gtk+. Various functions on the Gtk+ API take lists or return lists in this form.
The list deals with objects, these are pointers into unmanaged resources.

example.para: For example to create a list of widgets, you would use the following sample:
The argument to the constructor, allows the list enumerator code to return properly wrapped or demarshalled objects from the unmanaged world into the managed world.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int raw) cil managed

remarks.para: objects are constructed by passing an unmanaged reference to an existing , or they can use "(IntPtr) 0" as an initial value.
Using this constructor will not track the type information of the classes or structures kept in the list. If you plan on tracking the type information, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type element_type) cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructs a list of objects of a given type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int raw, class System.Type element_type) cil managed

remarks.para: objects are constructed by passing an unmanaged reference to an existing , or they can use "(IntPtr) 0" as an initial value.
Using this constructor will track the type information of the classes or structures kept in the list. This information is used by the List enumerator when returning data.

MemberSignature.Value: public List (Array elements, Type element_type, bool owned, bool elements_owned);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Array elements, class System.Type element_type, bool owned, bool elements_owned) cil managed

Docs.param: Array on elements to build the list.
Indicates if the list reference must be released on finalization.
Indicates if the list members must be released on finalization.
Docs.remarks: Constructs a native GList containing a set of member objects.

Docs.param: The type of the elements contained in the list.
if the native list needs to be released on Dispose.
if the list elements need to be released on Dispose.
Docs.remarks: This type is only recommended for marshaling GList parameters and return values in bindings.

Indicates if the list reference must be released on finalization.
